thread.title: Mexico City unveils rules for ride-hailing services, imposes minimum car value
thread.title_full: Mexico City unveils rules for ride-hailing services, imposes minimum car value | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Mexico City unveils rules for ride-hailing services, imposes minimum car value
text:
MEXICO CITY, July 15 The Mexico City government on Wednesday published new rules for ride hailing services like Uber including a 1.5 percent ride levy and requiring that vehicles used by drivers cost at least 200,000 pesos.
(Reporting by Max de Haldevang)
